text: @RandPaul I didn’t care for your political views but now I can add I don’t think you’re a decent human.   You put others at risk while awaiting your Covid-19 test results which ended up being positive! And now, you want to send children back to school with no regard for their well being.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
